SELECT N.NOTICE_CODE , N.TITLE , N.CONTENT , CAST(N.CREATED_AT AS CHAR) AS CREATED_AT , M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME , M.MEMBER_CODE , NI.IMAGE_URL FROM tbl_notice N INNER JOIN tbl_MEMBER M ON (N.MEMBER_CODE = M.MEMBER_CODE) INNER JOIN tbl_notice_img NI ON (NI.NOTICE_CODE = N.NOTICE_CODE) WHERE N.ACTIVE = TRUE
AND N.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
AND M.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{writerName}, '%')
ORDER BY N.CREATED_AT ASC
ORDER BY N.CREATED_AT DESC
LIMIT #{ pageSize } OFFSET #{ offset }

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_notice N INNER JOIN tbl_MEMBER M ON (N.MEMBER_CODE = M.MEMBER_CODE) WHERE N.ACTIVE = TRUE
AND N.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
AND M.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{writerName}, '%')

SELECT N.NOTICE_CODE , N.TITLE , N.CONTENT , CAST(N.CREATED_AT AS CHAR) AS CREATED_AT , M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME , M.MEMBER_CODE , NI.IMAGE_URL FROM tbl_notice N INNER JOIN tbl_MEMBER M ON (N.MEMBER_CODE = M.MEMBER_CODE) INNER JOIN tbl_notice_img NI ON (NI.NOTICE_CODE = N.NOTICE_CODE) WHERE N.ACTIVE = TRUE AND N.NOTICE_CODE = #{noticeCode}
